General.Name: Shenzhen Xunjiexing Technology Corp. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Xunjiexing Technology Corp. Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of printed circuit boards (PCB) in China. The company offers PCB samples and batch boards, and raw materials. Its products are used in security electronics, industrial control, communication equipment, aerospace, computer, medical equipment, automotive electronics, rail transit, and other fields. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: 906A, New Energy Resource Building, Shenzhen, China
